root: ^A voice calls out to Jorge, Jorge awakens in a slumped state.
^I can ask you the same thing, what are you doing here? This is private property.
^I don't know, I can't remember much, I don't even remember my own name. I just know I was runnning, I was... being chased? Am I safe? What is going?
^Hey, hey, hey just relax. I’ll take care of it and I’ll catch you up to date to where you are. You must’ve passed out or something.
^Running away in an abandoned buiding? Doesn't sound good at all. I gotta let the team know, something is wrong here...

^I’ll be back, I’m part of a team of paranormal investigators and this location is our assignment. I’ll get you sorted out and you can be on your way, I’m gonna bring in the rest of the equipment for my team.
^Before Jorge can say anything, Rishi walks out of the room and his footsteps echo out of the area. Jorge struggles but manages to get up.
^Rishi walks out of the building, while Girish enters, and the doors slam shut behind him with a loud bang. The lights begin to shatter.
^Don looks up from where he is at and sees Girish struggling to open the door.
^This isn’t my doing! I’m stuck out here!
^Seems better out there than in here.. Get these doors open, Diego and I will investigate the place.
^Don and Girish look at each other, confused.
^Hi, the guy out there said you can help me?
^What are you doing here? This is private property.
^I don’t know how I ended up here, I woke up in that corner over there and I can’t remember anything, I don’t know how I got here.
^You expect us to just believe that?
^I guess your explanation will have to do for now, wait here. Girish?
^I’ll finish setting up the cams, we might be able to use our new friend here.
^Suit yourself, I’ll check it out in the meantime.
^Did Rishi tell you what we’re doing here?
^Alright then, let me get you started on how to use a spirit box.
